{
  "tool": "speccritic",
  "version": "dev",
  "issues": [
    {
      "id": "ISSUE-0001",
      "severity": "CRITICAL",
      "category": "NON_TESTABLE_REQUIREMENT",
      "title": "Performance requirement uses vague term",
      "description": "The spec requires the system to be 'fast' without a measurable metric.",
      "evidence": [
        {
          "path": "bad_spec.md",
          "line_start": 5,
          "line_end": 5,
          "quote": "must perform well and be fast"
        }
      ],
      "impact": "Cannot verify requirement in a test.",
      "recommendation": "Replace 'fast' with a numeric latency budget.",
      "blocking": true,
      "tags": []
    },
    {
      "id": "ISSUE-0002",
      "severity": "CRITICAL",
      "category": "CONTRADICTION",
      "title": "Authentication requirement contradicts itself",
      "description": "Requirement 2 mandates authentication but also permits unauthenticated access.",
      "evidence": [
        {
          "path": "bad_spec.md",
          "line_start": 10,
          "line_end": 10,
          "quote": "Users must be authenticated. The system also allows unauthenticated access."
        }
      ],
      "impact": "Implementers cannot determine the correct access policy.",
      "recommendation": "Remove the contradiction and define a single authentication policy.",
      "blocking": true,
      "tags": []
    }
  ],
  "questions": [],
  "patches": []
}
